value:
Your uniform for this order is so
attractive. And it's a lovely match
for what I like to wear too!

I'm sorry to say that I mustn't ever
tell you of my homeland. Still, I will be
absolutely true to you in battle.

There's no knowing for how long
you and I will be here. So, friend, let's
be sure to take care of each other.

I'm fond of singing, especially while
standing in lakes. Believe me, it's far
different from singing on battlefields.

You'll often find me singing. I hope
you like songs. They convey truth in
ways that the written word cannot.

By any chance, are you perhaps
$Nu?$k$pI bring best wishes from our
group to yours in the name of
$Nf.

I must sing in celebration of
such wonderful success!

Even my voice feels a little
stronger!

Well, every difference makes
a ripple.

My heart swells in thanks. I will
give you my all!

My name is Azura. I offer you my song.
As for where I'm from? Two kingdoms,
in a way... Both Nohr and Hoshido.

You are the ocean's gray waves—♪
So you've come to see me again,
$Nu...$k$pYou visit so often, I find myself
looking for you whenever I am
singing. You are a lovely audience. $k$pMy song is powerful, but that power
is both great and terrible.$k$pIt can be used to rally and refresh
the spirit...or enslave it.$k$pBut it seems the song's power is
much less in this world, as is the
danger to the singer.$k$pSo I can stay by your side to the
end. And one day I will tell you of
the kingdom of silence I was born in.
はっ
やあっ
うあっ！
Formidable...
Time for your final bow.
You're finished!
Now for a showstopper!
Let's cut this short.
But, my voice...
Heehee
We can do this!
I have faith in you.
Hummed melody for this lyric: "You are the ocean's gray waves."
Daybreak always brings new hope. And, if you have long hair, more tangles!
There's power fathomless within my pendant.
I wonder where this realm is in relation to Nohr and Hoshido, or even... Ah, never mind.
I vow to bear you up, like a ship upon the waves, no matter what may come.
Yes?
Let's go.
What can I do?
